channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
hey peeps, i wanna set up a webclient, i got the .jar client and cache downloader 100% i just dont know what to do with the html, could somebody set me up with the html?
server name : ReaperXScape link to dropbox client : https://www.dropbox.com/s/fcgm27hwkv6nf78/PlayerClient.jar jar file name : PlayerClient.jar Size : width 765, height 503

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

seeing as there are countless tutorials on setting up a webclient, and they generally all provide sample markup; please try searching around before posting. as for your problem, this should suffice.

and here if you wanna pass some parameters to the client or the jvm<param name="PARAMETER" value="VALUE">

remember, google should always be your priority before posting here.

http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_applet.asp
http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_param.asp

Read full topic
